subtitleNullable: ~4000 articles from CNN collected on October 6th 2023
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains information from around 4000 CNN articles, including:
- Title
- Description
- Article body
- Keywords
- Theme

I created this as part of my Scientific Initiation program in university with the intention of studying prediction algorithms, with the article's theme being the outcome

The data was collected using simple web scraping techniques and the python code is available in my github: https://github.com/PedroRibeiroA123/CNNwebscrapper2023/

Creative Commons License
